gamerule.chanceToTame.description: Defines succes rate of taming with Golden Wheat.
gamerule.allowPettingByDefault.descripti: If false, new player won't be able to use Golden Wheat to tame unless they are allowed with commands.
gamerule.maximumHealthPercentageToTame.d: Defines maximum percentage of mob's health to become tameable with Golden Wheat.
gamerule.maximumTameCount.description: Defines maximum tameable mob per player. Only counts mobs tamed with Golden Wheat. Set value to "-1" to disable limit.
gamerule.healMobWhenTamed.description: If true, heals the mob when tamed with Golden Wheat.
